movies.title: Parasyte: Part 1
movies.plot: The humanity is suffering from murders all over the globe, called "Mincemeat murders". High school student, Izumi Shinichi has a parasite living off him, having replaced his right hand, and he might be the discoverer of truth.
movies.simplePlot: The humanity is suffering from murders all over the globe, called "Mincemeat murders". High school student, Izumi Shinichi has a parasite living off him, having replaced his right hand, and he might be the discoverer of truth.

biography.bio: Shôta Sometani was born on September 3, 1992 in Japan. He is an actor, known for Themis (2011), Parasyte: Part 1 (2014) and Les enfants loups, Ame & Yuki (2012). He has been married to Rinko Kikuchi since December 31, 2014.
biography.name: Shôta Sometani

biography.bio: Eri Fukatsu was born on January 11, 1973 in Oita, Japan. She is an actress, known for Villain (2010), Vers l'autre rive (2015) and A Ghost of a Chance (2011).
biography.name: Eri Fukatsu

biography.bio: Ai Hashimoto was born on January 12, 1996 in Kumamoto Prefecture, Japan. She is an actress, known for Confessions (2010), The Kirishima Thing (2012) and Parasyte: Part 1 (2014).
biography.name: Ai Hashimoto

biography.bio: Kazuki Kitamura was born on July 17, 1969 in Osaka, Japan as Yasushi Kitamura. He is an actor, known for Kill Bill: Vol. 2 (2004), Kill Bill: Vol. 1 (2003) and The Raid 2 (2014).
biography.name: Kazuki Kitamura

biography.bio: Masahiro Higashide is an actor, known for The Kirishima Thing (2012), Blue Spring Ride (2014) and Gonin Saga (2015). He has been married to Anne Watanabe since January 1, 2015.
biography.name: Masahiro Higashide

biography.bio: Asano Tadanobu is a Japanese film actor. His father, an actors' agent, suggested he take on what became his first role, in the TV show "Kimpachi Sensei," at the age of 16. His film debut was in the 1990 Swimming Upstream (Bataashi kingyo (1990)), though his first major critical success was in Shunji Iwai's Fried Dragon Fish (1993). His first critical success in the West was in Hirokazu Koreeda's Maborosi (1995), in which he played a man who inexplicably throws himself in front of a train, widowing his wife and orphaning his infant son. His best known works internationally are the samurai films Gohatto (1999) and The Blind Swordsman: Zatoichi (2003). It was on the set of Iwai's Picnic (1996) that he met and fell in love with J-Pop idol Chara. They married soon after learning she was pregnant with their first child, Sumire. While best known for characters who are psychologically offbeat, if not downright psychotic (e.g. Kakihara in Ichi the Killer (2001)), Asano has been described by those who know him as a down-to-earth family man. He has directed commercial TV spots for Chara. Hesistant to identify himself as an actor, he most readily describes himself as a vocalist, referring to Mach 1.67, the band he has with director Gakuryû Ishii. He's also an artist, and sometimes works as a model, most notably for the Japanese designers Takeo Kikuchi and Jun Takahashi.
biography.name: Tadanobu Asano

biography.bio: Miko Yoki is an actress, known for Parasyte: Part 1 (2014) and Izakaya yurei (1994).
biography.name: Miko Yoki

biography.bio: Jun Kunimura was born on November 16, 1955 in Kumamoto, Japan. He is an actor, known for Kill Bill: Vol. 2 (2004), Kill Bill: Vol. 1 (2003) and Audition (1999).
biography.name: Jun Kunimura

biography.bio: Hirofumi Arai was born on January 18, 1979 in Hirosaki, Japan as Kyung-Sik Park. He is an actor, known for Confessions (2010), Blood and Bones (2004) and Go (2001).
biography.name: Hirofumi Arai

biography.bio: Pierre Taki was born on April 8, 1967 in Shizuoka, Japan as Masanori Taki. He is an actor, known for Frozen (2013), The Devil's Path (2013) and Shin Godzilla (2016).
biography.name: Pierre Taki

biography.bio: Sadao Abe was born on April 23, 1970 in Chiba, Japan as Takashi Abe. He is an actor, known for Kamikaze Girls (2004), Maiko haaaan!!! (2007) and After Life (1998).
biography.name: Sadao Abe

biography.bio: Satoshi Araki is an actor, known for Parasyte: Part 1 (2014), Parasyte: Part 2 (2015) and Tamori Club (1982).
biography.name: Satoshi Araki

biography.bio: Nao Ohmori was born on February 19, 1972 in Tokyo, Japan. He is an actor, known for Ichi the Killer (2001), From Up on Poppy Hill (2011) and Vibrator (2003).
biography.name: Nao Ohmori

biography.bio: Kimiko Yo was born on May 12, 1956 in Yokohama, Japan. She is an actress, known for Departures (2008), Shin Godzilla (2016) and Café Lumière (2003).
biography.name: Kimiko Yo

camera: Red Epic, Zeiss Master Prime, Fujinon Alura, Premier and Angenieux Optimo Lenses
